column1: ,Fluid therapy for acute bacterial meningitis,Ian K Maconochie, Soumyadeep Bhaumik",Review - Intervention,TRUE,NA,Maintenance fluids versus restricted fluids for acute bacterial meningitis,paediatric patients with acute bacterial meningitis  ,shospital inpatient department  ,restricted fluids," Acute bacterial meningitis remains a disease with high mortality and morbidity rates.
